metadata.title: CVE-2020-11086 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In FreeRDP less than or equal to 2.0.0, there is an out-of-bound read in ntlm_read_ntlm_v2_client_challenge that reads up to 28 bytes out-of-bound to an internal structure. This has been fixed in 2.1.0.

notes.note: mdeslaur> The freerdp package in Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS does not build a server library. This is simply a client denial of service that has a negligible security impact.

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1+dfsg1-1').
